description: GemBox.Spreadsheet is a .NET component that enables developers to read, write, convert and print spreadsheet files (XLSX, XLS, ODS, CSV, HTML, PDF or XPS) from their .NET applications using one simple API.
releaseNotes:
- Fixed performance issues with ExcelPicture.
- Fixed issues with font fallback strategy.
- PDF/XPS/print renderer is completely reimplemented. Added support for fit to page, page scaling, fixed issues with rendering merged cells, etc.
- Added support for exporting and importing ExcelWorksheet to System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.
- Fixed XLSX reading issue with reading column groupings.
- Fixed XLSX issue with preserving shape hyperlinks.
- Export to HTML file format is completely reimplemented.
- Added support for exporting all sheets to HTML file format.
- Fixed several issues with exporting to HTML file format.
- Added support for writing files in MHTML file format.
- Fixed several issues with XLS formula parser.
- Fixed XLSX reading issue with reading theme colors.
- Added support for table styles through preservation in XLSX file format.
- Fixed XLSX and XLS issue with dates between 1899-12-31 and 1900-29-2.
summary: GemBox.Spreadsheet is a .NET component for reading and writing spreadsheet files (XLSX, XLS, CSV, ODS, HTML, PDF and XPS).
